CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 7, 1955, pg. 12, reads: "Stunning! - This group of stunningly gowned young women were models at the fashion show given at the Fort Pitt Hotel by the Beauty Shop Owners and Beauticians of Pittsburgh during the two-day convention of state wide beauticians. Pictured: Mrs. Nancy Parr, Mrs. Marie Clay, Miss Jackie Lewis, Miss Shirley Sayles, Miss Christine Sumpter, Miss Mary Ann Woods, Mrs. Bobbie Brown, Mrs. Nellie Thomas, Mrs. Elaine Gibson, Mrs. Esther Austin and Mrs. Mary Sandidge. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of models Nancy Parr, Marie Clay, Jacqueline "Jackie" Lewis [Jacqui Thompson] wearing dark coat, Shirley Sayles, Christine Sumpter, Mary Ann Woods, Bobbie Brown, Nellie Thomas, Elaine Gibson, Esther Austin, and Mary Sandidge, in Fort Pitt Hotel for Pittsburgh Beauty Shop Owners and Pennsylvania State Cosmetologists conference
